epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication and security features.
epics.description: Develop a secure login mechanism that includes multi-factor authentication to ensure that only authorized users can access the banking portal. This epic encompasses creating secure user sessions and managing secure storage of user credentials and session keys.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard for users.
epics.description: Develop a user-friendly, customizable dashboard that displays relevant banking products and services based on the user's profile and eligibility. This dashboard should provide users with an overview of their accounts, transactions, and other financial activities.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Develop a responsive design for the portal.
epics.description: Ensure that the portal is responsive and provides a consistent user experience across various devices, including desktop, tablet, and mobile phones. This involves implementing adaptive layouts and testing on different screen sizes and operating systems.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modifications
epics.summary: Enable users to submit account opening requests and service modifications.
epics.description: Implement streamlined workflows that allow users to submit new account opening requests and service modifications with minimal clicks. This includes forms for data entry, validation, and submission, along with workflows for approval and processing of these requests.

epics.title: Real-time Status Updates and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide real-time status updates and notifications.
epics.description: Develop features to provide users with real-time status updates on their requests and transactions, along with email notifications. This ensures users are kept informed about the progress of their submissions and any necessary actions they need to take.

epics.title: Interaction History and Documentation Upload
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive interaction history and enable document uploads.
epics.description: Implement functionality to keep a detailed history of user interactions within the portal. Additionally, develop features to allow users to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface, ensuring that users can save and resume incomplete applications.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the portal with the bank's core banking system.
epics.description: Ensure seamless integration of the self-service portal with the bank's existing core banking system. This involves developing secure APIs, data synchronization mechanisms, and maintaining a separate database to ensure optimal performance and reliability.

epics.title: Role-based Access Control
epics.description: Develop and implement role-based access control to ensure that users can only view and access services appropriate to their profile and authorization level. This includes defining roles, permissions, and access policies tailored to different types of users.

user_stories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a multi-factor authentication mechanism, so that my account remains secure even if my password is compromised.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Authentication must use at least two factors, such as a password and a code sent to a registered mobile device.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. User is prompted for a second authentication factor after entering a password.
2. Authentication fails if the second factor is not provided correctly.
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a user with a valid password, When they log in, Then they should be prompted for a second authentication factor.
Given a user without a registered second factor, When they attempt to log in, Then the login should fail.

user_stories.title: Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to assign roles to users, so that access to resources is restricted based on user roles.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Roles should be configurable and should determine access permissions to various resources.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can be assigned one or more roles.
2. Access to resources is granted based on user roles.
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a user with an admin role, When they access an admin resource, Then access should be granted.
Given a user without the required role, When they attempt to access a restricted resource, Then access should be denied.

user_stories.title: Secure User Data
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my authentication data to be securely stored, so that my credentials are protected from unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Authentication data must be stored using strong encryption and hashing techniques.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. User data is encrypted at rest.
2. Passwords are hashed before storage.
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a user account, When authentication data is stored, Then it should be encrypted and hashed appropriately.
Given an attempt to access raw authentication data, When reviewed, Then the data should be unreadable.

user_stories.title: Responsive User Interface
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal interface to be responsive, so that I can access it on various devices seamlessly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The interface should adapt to different screen sizes including desktop, tablet, and mobile.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The portal should adjust to different screen sizes.
2. The UI elements should remain functional and readable on all devices.
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a desktop user, When they access the portal, Then the interface should be fully functional and readable.
Given a mobile user, When they access the portal, Then the interface should adapt to the smaller screen size.

user_stories.title: Consistent User Experience
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a consistent experience across all devices, so that I can navigate the portal smoothly regardless of the device used.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Navigation and functionality should be consistent across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Navigation patterns should remain consistent.
2. Core functionalities should be accessible on all devices.
user_stories.test_cases:
Given any device, When a user accesses the navigation menu, Then it should operate in a consistent manner.
Given any device, When a user utilizes core functions, Then they should operate correctly across all screen sizes.

user_stories.title: Adaptive Screen Resolutions
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to support various screen resolutions, so that the display is optimal and clear on all devices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The portal design should adapt to different resolutions without losing clarity.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The interface should render clearly at all supported resolutions.
2. User experience should not degrade at higher or lower resolutions.
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a low-resolution screen, When a user accesses the portal, Then the display should be clear and functional.
Given a high-resolution screen, When a user accesses the portal, Then the display should leverage the resolution for clarity.

user_stories.title: Display Tailored Products
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my dashboard to display banking products tailored to my profile, so that I can quickly find relevant services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Products displayed should be based on user's profile and eligibility.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Products displayed are relevant to the user's profile.
2. User can view and interact with tailored products on their dashboard.
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a user with a specific profile, When they access their dashboard, Then the displayed products and services should match their profile.
Given a user, When they view their dashboard, Then they should find the products interactive and relevant.

user_stories.title: User-Friendly Interface
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the dashboard to be user-friendly and intuitive, so that I can efficiently navigate and use its features.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The interface should be simple, intuitive, and easy to navigate.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Navigation within the dashboard is clear and intuitive.
2. Users can easily find and use essential features.
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a user, When they access the dashboard, Then they should find it easy to navigate.
Given a user, When they search for features, Then they should locate essential features with minimal effort.

user_stories.title: Quick Access to Features
user_stories.description: As a user, I want quick access to essential dashboard features, so that I can manage my banking needs efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Key features should be prominently displayed and easy to access from the dashboard.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Essential features are accessible from the dashboard.
2. Features are prominently placed for quick access.
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a user, When they use the dashboard, Then they should be able to access important features quickly.
Given a user, When they look for essential services, Then those services should be readily accessible.

architecture_generation.description: AWS architecture aligned to equivalent service mappings.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture diagram has been validated and enhanced to ensure all nodes and edges are consistent, unique, and complete. Placeholder nodes were added for missing references, and duplicate IDs were resolved. The architecture now adheres to the Azure Well-Architected Framework with improved security, reliability, and operational excellence. Quality rating: High.
